node.title: 'I just kept dialling': Just 40 minutes from Brisbane, Jayson couldn't find reception when his daughter was choking
node.alt: A photo of Ashleigh (left) and Jayson (right) standing side by side.
node.description: Hundreds of families are living without phone reception in Queensland's fourth largest local government area, with what experts and communities say is a symptom of rapid development and poor planning.
node.content:
["It's 2020.\u00a0Ashleigh Milroy\u00a0is crying and holding her choking daughter Daisy.", "Her husband\u00a0Jayson\u00a0wanted\u00a0more than anything to help her, and hold her.", "Instead, he was\u00a0running around his property with his phone to the sky hoping, praying, he can find a bar of reception to call an ambulance.", "\"I freaked and just kept dialling, dialling, dialling, and eventually I got through. So, I stood in that one spot, with one leg in the air and hoped that it didn't cut out,\" Mr Milroy said.", "This nightmarish scene was not unfolding on a disconnected station or in a tiny outback town,\u00a0it was happening at a suburban Queensland\u00a0home just eight minutes from a\u00a0shopping centre.", "", "
Jayson Milroy can't make a call at his home because he lives in a suburban blackspot in Logan.(ABC News: Tobias Jurss-Lewis)
", "Mr and Mrs Milroy are among hundreds of families living without phone reception in Logan, Queensland's fourth-largest local government area.", "Logan City Council said for some suburbs\u00a0it was a symptom of rapid development, while others have been neglected for more than\u00a040 years.", "\"People are having to walk to the end of their driveway or walk to the top of the hill to try and get signal,\" Deputy Mayor John Raven said.", "\"Some good friends of ours live around the corner, same thing. We go over there for a barbecue or something, and you can't make a call.", "\"He's got a little stick that he stands beside, and that's his phone call spot.\"", "
'Trapped'\u00a0and 'isolated'
", "Daisy has fully recovered but the memory of her choking still haunts the family.", "\"I would hate for someone else to just assume they could move somewhere so close to the city and then be trapped,\" Mrs Milroy said.", "", "
Ashleigh and Jayson Milroy's daughter, Daisy, has now fully recovered.(ABC News: Tobias Jurss-Lewis)
", "In the year since the incident, the Milroys' property \u2013 at Greenbank in Logan \u2013 has been connected to the NBN, but they are still without phone reception.", "\"If there's a storm and we get a blackout, there's no internet,\" Mrs Milroy said.", "\"My family gets quite concerned \u2026 I can't even send an email with my phone, or a text.\"", "Mr Milroy said he makes Wi-Fi calls over the \"dodgy NBN connection\" to run his earthmoving business, but he still drives to the corner store for important conversations.", "\"You name it, we've tried it. The boosters \u2026 the bees knees internet routers, it does nothing,\" Mr Milroy said.", "\"It's expensive, emotional \u2026 we're losing work. We can't get the calls in time. Like, we miss a call and that's a job gone.\"", "", "
Mr and Mrs Milroy have to use Wi-Fi to make calls because they have no reception at their house.(ABC News: Tobias Jurss-Lewis)
", "Mr and Mrs Milroy now both carry walkie-talkies to speak to each other, and\u00a0keep a satellite phone for emergencies.", "\"It's always in the back of our mind if something goes wrong, what do we do? \" Mrs Milroy said", "\"We've tried complaining several times \u2026 I'm using words like 'desperate' and 'I need help'.", "\"We love it here, it's beautiful, but it's at that point where we are having to decide on whether to stay or go.\"", "
Growing pains
", "Areas with little or no reception are known colloquially as blackspots \u2013 a renowned problem for disconnected rural areas due to the lack of infrastructure and\u00a0distance.", "", "
Mr Raven said if the infrastructure was not built now, it was\u00a0going to be too late.(ABC News: Tobias Jurss-Lewis)
", "However, Professor Emeritus David Thiel at Griffith University's School of Engineering and Built Environment said blackspots can appear in growing populations, where infrastructure has not kept up.", "\"In the case of Logan, it's the rapid expansion of suburbs,\" Mr Thiel said.", "\"Essentially people put in roads; they sub-divide housing blocks and then suddenly they think, we might need radio communications coverage. And that comes a lot later.", "The Federal Government established the Mobile Blackspot program \u2013 which aims to fund the creation of new mobile towers \u2013 after a review into regional telecommunication identified a lack of coverage in regional communities.", "As of September 30, 2021, the program had created 961 new stations.", "Logan City Council has independently spent more than $200,000 detailing a plan for fibre optics and telecommunication towers to draw more funding from the state and federal government.", "It has prompted a $2.5 million\u00a0commitment from the state government to improve\u00a0digital\u00a0communications in the city,\u00a0but Mr Raven said that was\u00a0just 5 per cent of the investment the city needs over the next decade.", "Logan's population is growing by about 7,500 people each year.", "\"By the time the Olympics arrive we'll have nearly half a million people living here,\" Mr Raven said.", "\"This is critical infrastructure \u2014\u00a0we need to get onto it as soon as we can.", "\"If we don't start building the infrastructure we need now for the future, it's going to be too late.\""]
